nodes.text: Government power should not be feared
If government power is not held accountable
Government power is necessary to protect citizens
Absolute government power without accountability leads to corruption
Government power led by the people shouldn't be feared
A people-led government should not be feared
Government power should be held accountable to the people
Government power should be used for its intended purpose of protecting citizens and maintaining order.
Government power is used for its intended purpose
With oversight and accountability from the people

messages.text: Government power should not be feared when it is transparent, held accountable to the people, and used for its intended purpose of protecting citizens and maintaining order.
clauses: Government power should not be feared
When Government power is transparent
Government power should be held accountable to the people
Government power should be used for its intended purpose of protecting citizens and maintaining order.

clauses: Government power should be feared

messages.text: government power by itself should be feared or it will lead to curruption

messages.text: Government power should not be feared when it is used for its intended purpose, with oversight and accountability from the people.

messages.text: government power should not be feared leads to revolution
clauses: Government power should not be feared
Fear of government power leads to revolution
